constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 124 (Tuesday, July 26, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. LAMBORN:
H.R. 8501.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1 Section 8
[Page H7171]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Education and Labor, Natural Resources, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Preventing Abortion Sanctuaries Act
